About Me

Let me tell you a few things about myself...

BIO

Hello! My name is Taylor, and I am a 23 year old Software Development student located in Melbourne, Victoria. At this current time, I have just under 2 months remaining on my Diploma at Swinburne University of Technology. I have a keen interest in Software Development, and I am hoping to gain entry into the industry with a Junior Position that will nurture me, help me to further progress my skills, and really make a career out of this!
In my spare time, I enjoy spending time with mates, online gaming, reading, watching movies, and keeping fit by attending the gym 7 days a week.

Diploma of Software Development (ICT50715)

Swinburne University Of Technology, 2018

Over the duration of this course, I gained experience developing in Industry Relevant languages, platforms and practices, with an emphasis on developing my Problem-Solving and Team-Work skills. The main languages focused on were C# WPF Applications, MySQL, XML, Basic JSON, ASP.Net MVC, and basic HTML and CSS. The main platforms focused on were Entity Framework and Microsoft Azure, whilst also learning useful software like Visual Studio Team Services (now Azure DevOps), Sparx Enterprise Architect, and more advanced Microsoft Project.

Certificate IV in Information Technology - Programming(ICT40115)

Swinburne University of Technology, 2017

Over the duration of this course, I learnt skill areas of Problem Solving, Database Design, Communication, Software Analysis and Design, and Project Management. Mainly focusing on C#, beginning with Console Applications and then moving onto WPF Applications, we also learnt MySQL databases, XML, Basics of JSON, and useful software like GitHub, Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio Enterprise, and Microsoft Project.
